name: Low Kick
description: You kick out at a creatureâ€™s lower half, dealing damage and attempting to knock it off balance. Make a melee attack, doing 1d8 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the target flinches.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
